short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IT Portal Password Lookup. It allows to find Account , Device , Local Password from IT Portal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify the look-up of IT Portal credentials via this plugin. It searches the portal for the site you are on and recommends credentials to use for login. The plugin can also be used to search for credentials without having to log in to the IT Portal.
